articles.title: Jay Chou to Malaysian football fans: 'I can postpone my concert, it's not a problem' - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Mandopop singer addresses ire over reduced seating for the ASEAN Football Federation Cup (AFF) held in Kuala Lumpur.
articles.content:
The 43-year-old then went on to add, "I hope everyone would be happy when they come to my concert."
Fans of the singer came to his defense.

articles.title: 'More the merrier': Asia tourist hubs ready for China influx - The Straits Times
articles.description:
From Sunday, travellers arriving back in China will no longer need to quarantine.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
TOKYO - In Tokyos Asakusa tourist district, caricaturist Masashi Higashitani is dusting off his Chinese as he prepares for an influx of travellers after Beijing ends inbound quarantine rules.
